record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will conduct a period of morning business.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I am going to speak on Iraq, but first--I see the distinguished Senator from Mississippi and the distinguished Senator from Pennsylvania on the floor--I will introduce a bill on behalf of myself, Senator Specter, Senator Lott, and Senator Reid, regarding the insurance industry.

record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. LEAHY, Mr. LOTT and Mr. SPECTER pertaining to the introduction of S. 618 are located in today's Record under "Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions.")
